meanings.definition: The quality or state of being negligible.
meanings.sent1: The negligibility of the error made it easy to overlook.
meanings.sent2: The negligibility of the difference in size was not a concern.
meanings.sent3: The negligibility of the tiny bug caused a big laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overshadowed the negligibility of her mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The negligibility of the pebble made it disappear in the sand.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is negligible or insignificant.
meanings.sent1: The negligibility of the cost made it an easy decision.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the negligibility of the impact.
meanings.sent3: The negligibility of the situation turned it into a funny story.
meanings.sent4: The negligibility of his words left a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The negligibility of the noise made it hard to notice.
